item.description:
Sculpture in the Garden

Come out and join us in the garden with our dear friend Bev this is always a great treat!  

On Saturday and Sunday, June 9th and 10th, from 9 am to 4 pm, Beverly Kaye will be hosting the 17th annual Sculpture in the Garden event on her property on Lorraine Drive in Woodbridge. Utilizing recycled materials, such as driftwood wood and stone, car parts and junk yard finds, 14 artists will be offering sculpture, pottery, dolls, robots, and more to delight and amaze the whole family. This year the show is designated as a CT Open House Day destination, and will once again be written up in Raw Vision magazine. The first 50 people to show up Saturday can take home a treasure from a table of recycled art auction catalogues, novels, and possibly even garden books, if I can bear to part with them. I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Not hard to find or just ask Bev who we are...
item.name: Sculpture in the Garden
